original_text: There was a piece of metal round the top of each cart. It was 23 centimetres deep. It was fixed at each corner of the cart with pieces of bronze. These pieces and the sides of each cart were all joined together.
korean_text: 받침 수레 위에 둥근 테두리가 있는데 높이가 반 규빗이요 또 받침 수레 위의 버팀대와 옆판들이 받침 수레와 연결되었고

sentences.original_text: There was a piece of metal round the top of each cart.
sentences.korean_translation: 각 수레의 상단 주위에 금속 조각이 있었다.

sentences.original_text: It was fixed at each corner of the cart with pieces of bronze.
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 청동 조각으로 수레의 각 모서리에 고정되었다.

sentences.original_text: These pieces and the sides of each cart were all joined together.
sentences.korean_translation: 이 조각들과 각 수레의 측면이 모두 함께 연결되었다.
